item.title: Catsaunders add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Suffering is a gift. In it is hidden mercy." -- Rumi

item.title: Catsaunders add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "But listen to me. For one moment quit being sad. Hear blessings dropping their blossoms around you." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Catsaunders add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Start a huge, foolish project, like Noahâ€¦it makes absolutely no difference what people think of you." -- Rumi

item.title: Catsaunders add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames" -- Rumi

item.title: Catsaunders add a quote by Jalalu'l-din Rumi
item.description: "I know you're tired but come, this is the way." -- Jalalu'l-din Rumi

item.title: Catsaunders add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "You wander from room to room Hunting for the diamond necklace That is already around your neck!" -- Rumi

item.title: Catsaunders add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "You were born with potential. You were born with goodness and trust. You were born with ideals and dreams. You were born with greatness. You were born with wings. You are not meant for crawling, so don't. You have wings. Learn to use them and fly." -- Rumi

item.title: Catsaunders add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "You think because you understand 'one' you must also understand 'two', because one and one make two. But you must also understand 'and'." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Catsaunders add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Give up to grace. The ocean takes care of each wave 'til it gets to shore. You need more help than you know." -- Rumi

item.title: Catsaunders add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "You are so weak. Give up to grace. The ocean takes care of each wave till it gets to shore. You need more help than you know." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
